title: Systematic Game-Based Intervention Program for Students with Mathematical Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computational skills and foundational elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Targeting students diagnosed with learning disabilities or learners with math foundational skills at 10-16th percentile, featuring intensive 5-day weekly sessions

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate a 25% or greater improvement in understanding fraction/decimal concepts within two weeks.
Learners maintain 80% operational accuracy through daily 10-minute math games over four weeks.
Learners achieve scores at or above the 25th percentile on standardized math assessments upon program completion.

resources: Customizable Math Game Platform (e.g., Prodigy Math Game)
Math Assessment Tool for Research Developers

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
